workshoptitle: How to Download the Oracle Java Development Kit (JDK)

tutorials.title: Introduction and Licensing
tutorials.description: Find the best JDK download for your use case.

tutorials.title: Manual Downloads from My Oracle Support
tutorials.description: Customers can download the JDK, components, and BPRs from My Oracle Support.

tutorials.title: Manual Downloads from Oracle.com or Software Delivery Cloud
tutorials.description: Anyone can download manually from Oracle.com or Software Delivery Cloud.

tutorials.title: Automatic Downloads with Java Management Service on OCI
tutorials.description: OCI users can use Java Management Service to download the JDK.

tutorials.title: Automatic Downloads from Oracle.com
tutorials.description: Anyone can automate downloads from Oracle.com.
